title: Introducing the New i-PRO Configuration Tool
text: In this article, we are going to take a quick look at the configuration tool released by i-PRO to support major VSM solutions.

title: Leading edge technology - the Halo 3C
text: How many times have you quoted a job and had customers question how they set up camera’s in a space that will potentially infringe on someone’s privacy rights? Halo 3C is the answer.

title: Latest Products from Dell
text: As a Dell Partner, you can trust that when you are buying Dell products from us, that you are buying genuine parts. Let’s take a look at a couple of products in our Dell range that shine in the catalogue.

title: Avigilon - H5A Multi-Sensor Camera
text: In this article, we’d like to introduce you to the Avigilon H5A Multisensor camera. It boasts 360-degree panoramic views with faster frame rates delivering high-quality images in even the most challenging of lighting situations.

title: Milestone Experience Days- ‘Change the Perceptions of what is possible’.
text: The Milestone South Pacific team are excited to invite you to attend the first Milestone XPerience Days 2023 on 26-27 July in QLD.

title: i-Pro Config Tool
text: i-PRO APAC has designed a configuration tool allowing its cameras to seamlessly integrate with Milestone Systems and…

title: In Depth SEN Product Review
text: Qolsys iQPanel-4. Check out the latest release of this feature packed and this very popular Alarm / Smart System. Now with the industry leading DSC PowerG wireless gear.

title: NEW - Avigilon in Halo 3C
text: Perfect for Education, Stadiums, Shopping Centers has the well known featured detection including various gases like CO, CO2, Air Quality, Vape, Vape THC but now comes with NEW functionalities like spoken keywords, motion detection, occupancy/people counting and even a panic button.

title: NEW Cameras
text: Did you miss SecTech or need more info on these superb new Tier 1 security cameras:- Pelco Esprit-Compact, i-Pro Multi-PTZ or Avigilon H6-Mini or any other product from these great brands Pelco , Avigilon , i-PRO.

title: Live Demos!
text: We showed live demos of many fantastic new products at SecTech over the last 3 weeks (like this i-PRO APAC Multi-sensor PTZ). If you need more information such as a spec sheet, price or a live demo then please reach out to your local branch and technical sales engineers at www.bgwt.com.au

title: SecTech 2023
text: Three massive weeks on the road with SecTech 2023 and may we say it has been the best and most fun SecTech ever! BIG thanks to our team for all the hard work. HUGE thanks to our terrific suppliers for your support! And lastly thanks to the customer and security industry for the record turn out!

title: Perth SecTech
text: We are away & off to a flying start. The stands are full and it’s only 1pm. Get down for beers and a demo at 4pm. www.SecTechroadshow.com.au
